patthana14.37:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.37:1.1_1: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.37:1.1_2: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo ca naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.37:2.1_0: Araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.37:3.1_0: Saraṇañca araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.37:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana14.37:5.1_0: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana14.37:6.1_0: Araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanaaraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.37:7.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, na ārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca …pe…
patthana14.37:8.1_0: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana14.37:9.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:9.1_1: Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:9.1_2: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa ca naaraṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:10.1_0: Araṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:11.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:11.1_1: Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:12.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri …pe…
patthana14.37:12.1_1: sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre …pe…
patthana14.37:12.1_2: magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe…
patthana14.37:13.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo, kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:14.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:15.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta …pe…
